description:
1997 Christensen 155'  ''Loon"

Refit:

LOON went through a complete top to bottom 19-month refit that brought her to better new condition.  She must be seen to be appreciated.

contact.name: Allied Marine - Fort Lauderdale - Bahia Mar

descriptions.title: Accommodations
descriptions.description:
Sleeps 12 in 6 staterooms in the Owner's party and 10 in crew including Captain's Cabin.

The interior of LOON is beautifully finished in light cherry with lacquers and exquisite detail work everywhere. She has an abundance of large deep windows on each deck level, giving her interior great light and an airy comfortable feeling.


Master stateroom: The master stateroom, located forward on the main deck is full beam with the king bed, and is finished in light cherry wood. The remodeled master bathroom has Jacuzzi tub and separate shower. There is a slate floor.

Four Guest staterooms: The guest accommodation  area opens from the lower deck lobby, with the three of the Lower cabins having convertible king beds that in minutes convert into two twins beds. In a highly practical design the two aft cabins can be united by sliding a partition to create a VIP suite with one queen berth (Stbd Aft) and a convertible King on Port Aft. All guest suites have excellent wardrobe space, and en suite bathrooms finished in Calacatta marble, and individual audio visual centers. A central passageway from the guest stateroom area gives crew access from the laundry area to the guest area for housekeeping duties.


Main Deck Cabin: Located on the main deck amidship to port, and completely refitted in 2018. Located aft of the Owner's suite and ahead of the galley, this cabin is ideal for nanny, staff, or children. It has an oversize queen berth and a full bathroom. It has all medical equipment for emergencies and can be accessed from the main deck foyer.

Dining Room: The main deck dining room is located aft of the foyer, with a large wood block table seating 10.

Main salon: With the primary living area being the bridge deck lounge, the main deck salon is an elegantly intimate space with an oversized Couch central and 4 arm chairs arranged around a coffee table. Access out to the aft deck.

Aft Deck: A lovely open aft deck has alfresco dining for 12 with a built in settee and chairs. There is a wet bar to port and storage to starboard. Stairs set to starboard lead down to a large swim platform. Stairs to starboard lead up to the bridge deck. Passarelle access is to port.

Day Bathrooms: Day bathrooms are located on the main deck and bridge deck levels.

Headroom: 6'9" throughout

Sky Lounge: Sky Lounge: The delightful sky lounge is the yacht's primary relaxation area and primary salon. There is comfortable group seating, a game table aft to port and a Service Bar to starboard. There is a large screen TV built in the forward cabinet.

Aft Bridge Deck: The outside deck, aft of the bridge deck sky lounge/ main salon area is arranged with chairs around coffee tables and is entirely shaded from the sun by the sundeck overhead above.

Bridge Cabin: Extremely spacious the Bridge cabin has a queen berth and is located on the bridge deck with ensuite bathroom, and additional amenities including desk and vanity, and extensive locker spaces.

Bridge: Well laid out and finished to the same standard as the rest of the yacht, there are three leather covered helm chairs which face a well arranged console. Along the aft bulkhead is a bench seat for guests to enjoy the cruise.

Sundeck: Exceptionally large, the sun deck has a helm station and three chairs forward. Aft of this is a central four place sun bed, a long settee and table to port, refrigerator and sink to starboard. There is a hardtop that covers the sun bed area and shades the sundeck when needed. Aft of the sunbeds centered is a large 10 person Jacuzzi. Tenders and davits are further aft. It is important to note that the aft tender deck has also been strengthened to accommodate helicopter landing.

Pantry: Located just forward of the galley, a full walk in pantry allows provisioning for extensive or remote cruising.

Crew Mess: The crew mess is located on the lower deck forward of the laundry room and walk in refrigerator/freezer  rooms. The settee and eating area is complimented by a crew galley and entertainment center.

Crew: 5 crew cabins for a total of 10, all with en suite baths.

Laundry: Located on the lower deck aft of the crew mess, equipment includes (2) washers and (2) dryers, roller iron and folding area with sink.

Engine Room: Centrally located aft of the guest staterooms, the engine room is serviced by an air conditioned control and switchboard room to starboard and a workshop to port. The former is equipped with the ship's central monitoring and alarm stations and the main switch gear with auto parallel and a 200 amp shore service.

Lazarette: Set up to support water sport activities, are easily accessed through the transom door which leads out to the massive swim platform.

Galley: Ship's galley is located on the main deck to port. A large central island with a massive top of Giallo Valenciano granite is devoted to food preparation. There are big windows and a door to the port side deck for easy provisioning.

descriptions.title: 2018-2019 Upgrades
descriptions.description:
Mechanical:

  • Naiad Zero Speed Stabilizers including, New fins, New Head Stock and rams, New Electrical driven Powerpack (HPU), ABS Approved fiberglass strengthening to hull, new oil conditioning cooling system, New Oil reservoir, Upgraded Main Engine PTO pumps.
  • Engine hours: Port 5553 (SMOH) / Stbd. 4918 (SMOH)
    Generator hours: Port 4330 (SMOH) / Stbd. 2980 (SMOH)
  • Added silver Ion filter and water filters throughout to be able to consume ships water
  • Added an Atlas 1600 davit to the bow to be able to store 4x jetskis on the fore deck. (davit can also be moved to the swim platform if needed)
  • Full rebuild of Sundeck davit. Nautical structures. Including all new motor, guides and cables) November 2019. Pass load tests Nov 2019
  • Headhunter grey water monitoring system installed
  • Top end rebuilds Port generator Nov 2018
  • Top end rebuilds Stbd Generator Nov 2019
  • Upgraded pumping system to MSD
  • AC, New compressor installed to #3. Installed CIP system to all chillers
  • Added redundancy raw water-cooling pumps to fridge/ freezer System.
  • ALL new emergency system back up batteries
  • Windlass port side Hydraulic Motor replaced with new.
  • Sand media filter installed to Water maker intake system
  • Compressed air drier and auto drain added to protect pneumatic control system.

Interior

  • New custom built furniture in main salon and sky lounge with internal storage
  • Cabin #6 refit to accommodate queen sized bed
  • Lower guest cabin refit 3 out of 4 cabins have convertible king/ twins. All new beds, mattresses, carpet and furnishings.
  • New sub zero draw fridge sky lounge bar
  • All new motorized blinds controlled by remote May 2019

Bridge

  • DVR recording on Camera system
  • Upgraded Nav Computer to be able to run Nobeltec Timezero Professional.
  • Auto pilot upgrade to be able to sail a course from Nav computer
  • Ran multiple Cat5 cables to captain’s cabin for remote monitoring in the cabin. Nav, radar, cameras,
  • BNWASS system installed in bridge, Capt cabin and crew Mess.
  • 2x Pepwave 4g modems installed for data

Entertainment

  • Intellian TVRO upgrade to 1m dish
  • AV Upgrade to Solsys media system. Movie and Music Library throughout.
  • Wifi upgrade to Cisco network throughout. Controlled by Kerio controller. With Dual pepwave 4g routers.

Galley

  • 2 new Kitchen Aid ovens installed Nov 2019
  • New Kitchen aid cooktop installed Nov 2019
  • New Viking Induction cooktop installed Nov 2018
  • Upgraded Voltage step up transformers for new galley equipment. To provide the required operating voltage.
  • CC TV added to galley

Deck

  • Removable hand rails around sun deck for Golf and water slide - 2018
  • Raw water feed plumed to sundeck for Slide - 2018
  • Main Deck aft dining Table installed a leaf to accommodate 12 people - 2018
  • New sun loungers added to Sundeck aft - 2018
  • All forward facing windows removed cleaned, trim painted and reinstalled - 2018
  • Upgraded swim platform Aft entrance hatch, New rams on doors and new remote-control opening system - 2018
  • Scuba tank rack - 2018
  • Added removable swim platform shower - 2018
  • New sun awning on sundeck - Nov 2019
  • All new issenglass wind sheild for sundeck  - Oct 2018
  • New chain locker floor installed - Nov 19
  • 3rd life raft added to sundeck for flag requirement to charter - 2018
  • Air pumping system installed for inflatables - 2018
  • Recovered Helm Sundeck Captains Chairs - Nov 2019

LEADING LUXURY YACHT BROKERAGE - FOUNDED IN 1945
Allied Marine is one of the largest, best established and most respected luxury yacht brokerage and yacht charter companies in the world. dealerListings.description:
50' 2005 Pershing 50  "Catch Me If You Can"

Brand New Engines in 2009 - Only 480 hours 

PRICE NEGOTIABLE 

Real innovations that dare to do today what becomes standard practice tomorrow. Like when Pershing introduced the hard top to the world of open yachts. The leading representative of this is the Pershing 50, a yacht that is well known for the distinctive sleek sweep of its windows with an unmistakable profile, famous twin windshield and slide away hard top. This yacht owes its fame to designing and performance that is second to none in her class.

This 2005 50’ Pershing is different from all the others. She had brand new 900 hp MAN engines installed in late 2009 by MAN and she is cleaner than her peers.

contact.name: Allied Marine - Fort Lauderdale - Bahia Mar

descriptions.title: Vessel Walkthrough
descriptions.description:
As you enter the lower salon you will find a meticulous study of proportions in this three stateroom layout. You will also find high ceilings, polished cherry wood with soft blue leather sitting areas and a flowing design. As you move forward you will find a master suite with private head and shower. 

Moving aft through the salon you will pass the galley on the starboard side and on towards the two guest staterooms. On the starboard side you will find a full berth and in the port guest stateroom you will find side by side twin berths. 

There are five LCD TV's with four receivers.

dealerListings.description:
1978 Hatteras 53' "Makana"

"Makana" has had the same owner since June of 1983. This yachtsman has spared no expense keeping this vessel in immaculate condition.

This 53' Hatteras Motor yacht is one of Hatteras most popular models! It has 3 stateroom, 3 head, walkaround decks with a large aft deck with seating for 7, stairs lead up to an ample size flybridge with a centerline helm forward seating and aft a storage area for a 13' Boston Whaler.  The lower accommodations have a stateroom forward with bunks and it's own head with shower.  Aft of the forward stateroom is a full width galley with updated appliances.  Moving aft thru the split engine room, is a port side stateroom with side by side berths and a separate head and shower starboard of the hallway.  Leading aft is the full width master with an enclosed head and shower, the berths are split on port and starboard.

LEADING LUXURY YACHT BROKERAGE - FOUNDED IN 1945
Allied Marine is one of the largest, best established and most respected luxury yacht brokerage and yacht charter companies in the world. Since 2008, Allied Marine has been a dealer of the Ferretti Group brands, a world leader in designing, building and marketing luxury motor yachts. Allied Marine is the exclusive dealer for Ferretti Yachts, Pershing, Itama, Riva, Mochi Craft; and an authorized dealer for Custom Line and CRN.

dealerListings.description:
1997 Christensen 155'  ''Loon"

Refit:

LOON went through a complete top to bottom 19-month refit that brought her to better new condition.  She must be seen to be appreciated.

contact.name: Allied Marine - Fort Lauderdale - Bahia Mar

descriptions.title: Accommodations
descriptions.description:
Sleeps 12 in 6 staterooms in the Owner's party and 10 in crew including Captain's Cabin.

The interior of LOON is beautifully finished in light cherry with lacquers and exquisite detail work everywhere. She has an abundance of large deep windows on each deck level, giving her interior great light and an airy comfortable feeling.


Master stateroom: The master stateroom, located forward on the main deck is full beam with the king bed, and is finished in light cherry wood. The remodeled master bathroom has Jacuzzi tub and separate shower. There is a slate floor.

Four Guest staterooms: The guest accommodation  area opens from the lower deck lobby, with the three of the Lower cabins having convertible king beds that in minutes convert into two twins beds. In a highly practical design the two aft cabins can be united by sliding a partition to create a VIP suite with one queen berth (Stbd Aft) and a convertible King on Port Aft. All guest suites have excellent wardrobe space, and en suite bathrooms finished in Calacatta marble, and individual audio visual centers. A central passageway from the guest stateroom area gives crew access from the laundry area to the guest area for housekeeping duties.


Main Deck Cabin: Located on the main deck amidship to port, and completely refitted in 2018. Located aft of the Owner's suite and ahead of the galley, this cabin is ideal for nanny, staff, or children. It has an oversize queen berth and a full bathroom. It has all medical equipment for emergencies and can be accessed from the main deck foyer.

Dining Room: The main deck dining room is located aft of the foyer, with a large wood block table seating 10.

Main salon: With the primary living area being the bridge deck lounge, the main deck salon is an elegantly intimate space with an oversized Couch central and 4 arm chairs arranged around a coffee table. Access out to the aft deck.

Aft Deck: A lovely open aft deck has alfresco dining for 12 with a built in settee and chairs. There is a wet bar to port and storage to starboard. Stairs set to starboard lead down to a large swim platform. Stairs to starboard lead up to the bridge deck. Passarelle access is to port.

Day Bathrooms: Day bathrooms are located on the main deck and bridge deck levels.

Headroom: 6'9" throughout

Sky Lounge: Sky Lounge: The delightful sky lounge is the yacht's primary relaxation area and primary salon. There is comfortable group seating, a game table aft to port and a Service Bar to starboard. There is a large screen TV built in the forward cabinet.

Aft Bridge Deck: The outside deck, aft of the bridge deck sky lounge/ main salon area is arranged with chairs around coffee tables and is entirely shaded from the sun by the sundeck overhead above.

Bridge Cabin: Extremely spacious the Bridge cabin has a queen berth and is located on the bridge deck with ensuite bathroom, and additional amenities including desk and vanity, and extensive locker spaces.

Bridge: Well laid out and finished to the same standard as the rest of the yacht, there are three leather covered helm chairs which face a well arranged console. Along the aft bulkhead is a bench seat for guests to enjoy the cruise.

Sundeck: Exceptionally large, the sun deck has a helm station and three chairs forward. Aft of this is a central four place sun bed, a long settee and table to port, refrigerator and sink to starboard. There is a hardtop that covers the sun bed area and shades the sundeck when needed. Aft of the sunbeds centered is a large 10 person Jacuzzi. Tenders and davits are further aft. It is important to note that the aft tender deck has also been strengthened to accommodate helicopter landing.

Pantry: Located just forward of the galley, a full walk in pantry allows provisioning for extensive or remote cruising.

Crew Mess: The crew mess is located on the lower deck forward of the laundry room and walk in refrigerator/freezer  rooms. The settee and eating area is complimented by a crew galley and entertainment center.

Crew: 5 crew cabins for a total of 10, all with en suite baths.

Laundry: Located on the lower deck aft of the crew mess, equipment includes (2) washers and (2) dryers, roller iron and folding area with sink.

Engine Room: Centrally located aft of the guest staterooms, the engine room is serviced by an air conditioned control and switchboard room to starboard and a workshop to port. The former is equipped with the ship's central monitoring and alarm stations and the main switch gear with auto parallel and a 200 amp shore service.

Lazarette: Set up to support water sport activities, are easily accessed through the transom door which leads out to the massive swim platform.

Galley: Ship's galley is located on the main deck to port. A large central island with a massive top of Giallo Valenciano granite is devoted to food preparation. There are big windows and a door to the port side deck for easy provisioning.

salesRep.salesMessage:
For more information on this listing, please call or text the Listing Agent directly:

Jim McConville 
Cell: 954.849.0855
Office: 954.376.4836
E-mail: jim.mcconville@alliedmarine.com
Website: www.AlliedMarine.com 

LEADING LUXURY YACHT BROKERAGE - FOUNDED IN 1945
Allied Marine is one of the largest, best established and most respected luxury yacht brokerage and yacht charter companies in the world. Since 2008, Allied Marine has been a dealer of the Ferretti Group brands, a world leader in designing, building and marketing luxury motor yachts. Allied Marine is the exclusive dealer for Ferretti Yachts, Pershing, Itama, Riva, Mochi Craft; and an authorized dealer for Custom Line and CRN.

description:
"SWEET ESCAPE" is a 130' Christensen Tri-Deck Motor Yacht with 6 staterooms comfortably accommodating 12 guests.  She recently underwent an extensive multi-million dollar refit and there are 6 weeks of upcoming charters scheduled from November 2020 through June 2021 in the Bahamas. 

"SWEET ESCAPE" is currently located in Fort Lauderdale, FL where a major engine overhaul is underway on her Caterpillar C-32's and 2 new 85kw Northern Lights generators are being installed.  

The seller is motivated to put a deal together before November and all offers are encouraged.
title: Price just reduced

descriptions.title: Sweet Escape Listing Details
descriptions.description:
Vessel Walk Through

Entering from starboard on SWEET ESCAPE, one will reach a formal  foyer with teak finished floors. There is also a well-appointed day head  in this area. Moving aft from the foyer one will enter the formal dining  area. The dining table can be set to accommodate 12 guests. The main  salon is appointed with beautiful furnishings, shaped settee, two comfortable swivel chairs, end table, a coffee table and ottomans. 

The main salon and dining area have ample storage with built in  serving areas. Forward to port is the state of the art galley with professional appliances, excellent counter space, storage, and refrigeration.   

One of the best features is the Island Counter and there is also plenty of natural light coming through the large galley windows.

Forward of the galley is a large pantry providing more storage and also acts as a buffer to eliminate noise from the galley to the on deck VIP.

The on deck full beam VIP en suit has a king sized berth, closet, desk/ vanity,and sitting area.

Amidship stairs lead down to the 5 well-appointed staterooms below.

The full beam master is found forward with a king size berth, desk/vanity, settee to starboard, walk in closet and His and Hers  bathroom.  Hers with tub and shower and\his with shower. 

Moving aft  from the master you will find the remaining 4 guest cabins.  The large lower VIP cabin has a king berth and thee other two twin cabins  twin cabins can covert to king berths, and finally the 6th stateroom has two adjacent bunk beds. 

All cabins have the best entertainment systems, are well appointed, and have ample storage.

From the formal foyer one will go up a spiral staircase to the upper  landing that will take one aft to the sky lounge or forward to the pilothouse. 

The pilothouse has the state of the art navigation equipment and there are three raised helm chairs.  One can reach the spacious captain's  cabin from this area. There are ample walk around side decks with  pilothouse entry doors allowing for easy movement around the deck and the entire vessel. 

Aft from the upper landing one enters into the sky lounge where you  are surrounded by full length windows offering excellent views and and natural light. There is a bar with five bar stools to starboard, a settee with end tables, two chairs and a coffee table to port. The sky lounge table to port. The sky lounge is a beautiful area for entertaining,  watching movies or hanging out at the bar. There is also a recently remodeled day head on this deck. 

Moving aft from the sky lounge through the large double sliding doors, one will enter the boat deck. Here you will find a beautiful built in service area and tables with seating for 12 to dine outside. From this  area one can go up another set off stairs to the sundeck.  The sundeck features a large sun pad and Jacuzzi.

Moving back down to the aft deck, one can enter the main salon  through the glass doors. This beautiful and spacious aft deck features deck features a large teak table that seats 12 guests. There is a built in settee with a table. There is a wet bar with granite counter tops, sink, and refrigerator. The aft deck is designed to be well protected from  the elements by its overhang and optional eisenglass enclosure. 

From the aft deck one can go down a set of stairs to a large hydraulic  swim platform that makes for easy access to the water for swimming or any water sports.

 

Indoor/Outdoor and Dining

 

AFT DECK: 

The aft deck offers fully covered dining for 12 featuring a wet bar with refrigerator, sink, and retractable 55 inch HDTV with access to the central satellite receiver, movie server, and surround sound cinema.  The aft deck can be enclosed with eisenglass and includes heating/air conditioning.  There is a passerelle for Med-style boarding and wide walk around decks leading to the bow. 

 

Swim Platform: 

Accessed on the starboard side, the hydraulically operated swim    platform has a rain shower head and underwater lighting with easy access to Sweet Escape’s custom inflatable toy dock.

 

Salon: 

The voluminous salon has ample seating areas and expansive headroom creating the feel of a much larger yacht.  Within the salon there is a game table for 6 guests, Control4 lighting and entertainment  system with a 75 inch HDTV accessing the central satellite receiver, central movie server, Bluetooth audio, 7.2 cinema surround sound, PlayStation 4, wine wall, piano and a stylish day head.

 

Formal Dining: 

Adjacent to the main salon, the formal dining area has an extendable  rectangular dining table, which comfortably seats up to 12 guests.

 

Portuguese Bridge: 

A charming private space to enjoy spectacular views, this magnificent semicircular seating area has a new dining table which accommodates up to 12 guests for alfresco dining.  

 

Sky Lounge on Bridge Deck: 

Located on the bridge deck, the sky lounge features a marvelous full  bar with swivel bar stool seating for 5. Sofa, chairs, and stools add an  additional 7 ­plus seats. This comfortable lounge area is the perfect spot to unwind after a fun filled day, with a 60 inch HDTV, surround sound, access to central satellite receiver, and movie server, Bluetooth  audio, and a convenient day head.

 

Bridge Deck Aft: 

This multipurpose area benefits from full sun but includes a variety of  sun-shade arrangements.

Features include alfresco dining for up to 12 guests, four sun loungers, lounge seating for up to 12, two large parasols,and access to the  sundeck and Portuguese bridge.

 

Sun Deck: 

A sun worshiper's dream with sensational panoramic views, port, and  starboard settee seating, a 6–8 ­person Jacuzzi, over sized sun pad, BBQ and a variety of shade configurations.

 

Recent Vessel Upgrades 2017- Current 

Major overhaul Caterpillar C-32 service scheduled September, 2020

(2) New 85kw Northern Lights generators (2020)

New davit on the bow (2018)

New hydraulic platform on stern (2018)

(3) New AC chillers and new ducting (2018)

 

Updates in the Salon 2017- 2018

New wall coverings, new carpet, new headliners, new LED lighting, new audio visual, new soft goods, and new furnishings.

New electric blinds and shades

New 75 ­inch Sony TV

New Ronald self ­playing piano

New recessed trey ceiling with LED lighting

New Smart Home Theater System which functions throughout the  entire vessel

New 7.2 Surround sound system

New glass enclosed wine rack with climate control and rope lighting

New Swarovski crystal drop lighting above the formal dining area

 

Updates in the Galley 2017-2018

(2) New Mielie commercial full ­size freezers

(2) New Miele commercial full size refrigerators

(1) New Miele chest freezer

(2) New Mielie commercial ovens

(2) New Perlick freezer drawers

New Sharp microwave

New Thermomix

 

Updates in the Sky Lounge 2017-2018

New wine cooler New Refrigerator

New carpet, wall coverings, headliners, and LED lighting

New 60 ­inch HDTV

New 5.1 surround sound

 

Updates in the Bridge and Sundeck 2017-2018

(3) New custom sun shades

New stainless Grill

New exterior sun pads and upholstery

New Led Lighting and outdoor speakers

 

Updates at Helm 2017-2018

New Garmin chart plotter 17 ­inch 8000 series

New Fusion UD­650

New Ships computer with updated Navionics software

New Satellite TracVision HD 11

New TracPhone V7IP

New Garmin Doppler Radar

Rebuilt both wing stations and added new equipment

 

More updates 2017-2018

New Atlas shore power 75kw

New Sewage treatment ECOMAT

New Head Hunter system

All Hydraulic Systems were rebuilt and serviced

New Scotsman commercial Ice maker

Air Conditioning added to the engine room 

 

Tenders Toys and Entertainment

39' Nor­tech with Triple 300hp Mercury Verados

19’ AB Tender with 150hp Four Stroke Yamaha 

(2) Yamaha Jet Skis

(1) Seadoo Jet Ski with Fly board Giant Water Slide Inflatable Dock Hydraulic Swim Platform with boarding ladder & Rain shower

(4) Seabobs (underwater scooters) ­ F5 models

dealerListings.description:
"Kaleen" is a 1983/2017 Broward 110' Enclosed Bridge Motor Yacht featuring a massive full beam salon, full beam master mid-ship and a spacious on deck VIP. She has a rich yachting history and has been owned by the same family for nearly 20 years.

"Kaleen" was hailed the crown jewel of Broward Marine at her launch and has been maintained the highest standards her entire life.  Her recent major refit in 2017 combined with an aggressive asking price makes "Kaleen" a must see within the market.
dealerListings.title: Price just reduced

descriptions.title: Walkthrough and All Details
descriptions.description:
The aft deck is open with overhead cover from the extended boat deck. A teak stairway to port leads to the swim platform. A watertight door on the transom to starboard opens into the lazarette. The aft deck has a large L-settee, 4 teak chairs and table that will comfortably seat up to 8 persons for al fresco dining. There is a wet bar with ice maker on the forward bulkhead to port and additional storage cabinets to starboard. When entering the main salon from the aft deck the eye is immediately drawn to the beautiful, back lit, etched glass sea life mural on the forward bulkhead. The main salon/dining area is full beam, decorated in neutral tones accented with black granite. To port is a wet bar with wine cooler and refrigerator. There is an L-settee to port with matching ottoman and a U-settee to starboard with glass topped coffee table. An entertainment center with hi/lo TV, DVD and stereo /CD player is housed in the port side cabinetry that serves as a divider between the main salon and the dining area. To starboard, opposite this cabinet, is a stairway leading to the master and guest staterooms.  The formal dining area has a glass topped table with seating for 8. To port and starboard are built in cabinetry with black granite tops. The etched glass mural is on the forward bulkhead Access to the main exterior deck is via the starboard side foyer. There is a day head just forward of the dining area and a stairway leading to the sky lounge. The full galley is amidship and features a full size walk in refrigerator as well as a day refrigerator and 2 large freezers, an informal dinette, 2 convection ovens, glass cook top and ample storage and counter space. Forward of the galley is the VIP stateroom with queen berth and en suite head and shower. Fully forward is the stairway to the crew's quarters which has accommodations for 4 to 5 crew. The engine room is accessed from the crew's quarters. The stairway from the starboard foyer leads to the pilothouse/sky lounge. The pilothouse helm is full beam with wing controls to port and starboard in addition to the main helm station. The console houses a full array of state of the art navigation equipment. A large bench settee provides helm seating and storage with an entertainment center in the aft compartment for the lounge area. The lounge is a cozy informal area with a large, black leather L-settee, glass coffee table and tub chair. The door to starboard opens to a large sun deck with a wet bar, an enormous lounge area and teak occasional tables. The boat deck is aft. The stairway to starboard in the main salon leads to the staterooms. The master is full beam amidship with a king size berth running athwartship on the starboard bulkhead. Opposite on the port bulkhead is an entertainment center and built in drawer storage. The aft bulkhead is hanging lockers with full length mirrors in the door panels. Forward are ensuite his and her baths. The starboard bath features a full-size Jacuzzi tub and the port head features a glass enclosed shower.  Aft of the foyer are 2 guest staterooms each with en suite head and shower. The port cabin has a queen berth and the starboard cabin has twin berths. Both suites have ample drawer storage, hanging lockers and TV/DVD/stereo.

 

SALON

The full beam main salon has teak paneling, cream colored carpeting with matching upholstered overhead panels. Settees are light beige, accented with colorful throw pillows. The window treatments match the settees. Cabinets are topped with black granite.

U-shaped settee Sculptured mermaid coffee table L-shaped sofa and ottoman   Curved wet bar w/refrigerator and wine cooler Built-in entertainment center w/ hi/lo TV, DVD, stereo and CD player, and Savant System with iPad controller Pony wall separates main salon from the Dining Salon Glass-topped table 8 Upholstered dining room chairs Black granite topped built-in cabinetry Etched glass, back lit marine life mural

The range on “Kaleen” currently is 1200 nautical miles at 1800 rpm (11-12 kts) and 1500 -1600 nautical miles at 1400 - 1500 RPM (9kts) This can be increased as there are 2 x 500-gallon fuel tanks that are currently not being utilized.

descriptions.title: Description
descriptions.description:
With her tall freeboard and sleek appearance, the Cruisers 3672 Express conveys the impression of being a much bigger boat, actually measuring in above 40 foot.  Built on a cored modified-V hull with prop pockets and an integrated swim platform, she creates a very low draft of 3'0 feet. 

Additional features include a walk-through windshield, a shower stall in the head, excellent engine room access, and a cockpit wet bar.  With twin 496 Mercruiser's totaling 850 horsepower she will comfortably cruise at 25 knots and has top speeds of 33 knots.

dealerListings.description: "Mr Mouse" is a 2012 Avangard 42-meter which was officially delivered as new in April of 2018.  Her five stateroom layout with the master stateroom on deck offers the ideal layout for this steel built tri-deck expedition yacht.  "Mr Mouse" offers long range cruising capabilities up to 3500 nautical miles and is in pristine like new condition.  Easy to view in Porto Carras, Greece
dealerListings.title: Available now

descriptions.title: Overview
descriptions.description:
Mr. Mouse is a 42-meter tri-deck luxury expedition yacht, built to the highest standards offering unmatched stability and long-range cruising capabilities.  She accommodates up to ten guests in five staterooms including a full beam master cabin on the main deck with two VIP and two twin guest staterooms below. 

WALKTHROUGH

Exterior
Beautiful teak decks are on all 3 levels and the outdoor areas are well designed giving the owner and guests several areas to dine, lounge in the sun, shade, or relax in the Jacuzzi.  The stern features a massive hydraulic Opacmare swim platform, capable of holding a large tender and the davit loads the jet skis on the bow.  This arrangement keeps all the tenders and toys clear from the main decks which maximizes the space for relaxation and outdoor entertaining. 

Interior
The main salon is filled with natural light. The use of American Walnut, high quality leather, granite and brushed stainless steel with minimal use of textures gives an asymmetrical balance and amplifies the space. A large, well-equipped cocktail bar services the main salon and has easy access along the port side to the spacious galley.  The modern design continues throughout the yacht with leather hand-railed stairs leading down the starboard side to the guest rooms and moving forward into the full beam highly desirable on deck master stateroom. 

Accommodations
The master stateroom is on the main deck and there is a small office area with desk on the outboard side and a cleverly disguised walk-in closet opposite. The stateroom has a flush mounted TV, Bose surround sound, two-person sofa and en-suite granite bathroom that features a large rain shower.  

The two VIP aft queen cabins have en suite bathroom containing showers toilet and bidet, and customized marble throughout.  Each VIP has a couch facing the TV on the outboard side and a work desk underneath the TV. 

Two forward twin cabins have an en suite shower room with toilet and customized marble throughout.  Each guest stateroom offers a full Bose entertainment system and recessed lighting underneath the beds.

Galley
The spacious galley is fully equipped with Miele oven, dishwasher, electric BBQ, wine cooler, fridge, freezer, oven and microwave. It has access from the port side deck and down to the crew mess and crew living area allowing for discreet service.

Bridge 
Walking up the stairs from the lobby leads into the pilot house and the captain’s office. Both are equipped with state-of-the-art communication, navigation and technical equipment.

Skylounge
Aft of the pilot house is a large sky lounge with cocktail bar, day head and wide windows create an idyllic panoramic view.

Lazarette
On the port-side aft is a single engineer’s cabin with toilet and shower en suite.

Forward to port are three large stand-up freezers and two technical spaces on the starboard side, with washer, dryer and access to the starboard aft.

Crew Quarters
Crew lounge for 6, forward to port is a double captain’s cabin with toilet and shower en suite.


MECHANICAL EQUIPMENT

Twin MTU engines 12V2000 M70 2000HP
Engine hours: Port 722 hours, Starboard 722 hours ( May 2020)

description:
Owner May Consider Later Model Vessels 95'-100' in Trade

Kabir is an elegant, beautifully styled, 2007 130 Ft. Mangusta M130S Limited Edition and is a magnificent example of what Overmarine is capable of producing.  Designed by Stefano Righini she was built in Viareggio, Italy  to Bureau Veritas Class.  Unlike the conventional M130, this super-yacht features a raised pilot house and a flybridge, dramatically increasing both the interior volume and the outside deck areas, allowing space for two saloons.  Her lavish interior was designed by Luxury Interiors.  In July 2020 she completed a massive refit with over $1.8m invested that includes many outstanding upgrades. 

Highlights of the 2020 $1.8m Recently completed Refit:

  • New Humphree Stabilization system including “at anchor” option (stabilizers do not hinder the performance that these vessels are known for) 
  • New KVH HD11 satellite system for worldwide television service 
  • New 4009 VSAT antenna and dome  
  • New custom day head on sundeck
  • New Atlas 75kw shore power converter, with warranty
  • Complete new air conditioning system: 3 Compressors, pumps, 32 air handlers 
  • New Main Switchboard upgrade for automatic seamless transfer operations between generators and shore power.  Touch screen operation, load sharing, and automated paralleling of generators
  • New Custom Engine room and Metcalf Marine Exhaust systems for port and starboard Main Engine Exhausts
  • Generator ends 
  • New Main Engine Batteries 
  • All New Zincs 
  • New Gyro

 

 "Kabir" not for sale to U.S. residents in U.S. waters
title: 130s Model Newly Stabilized

descriptions.title: Description
descriptions.description:
ACCOMMODATIONS 

Kabir's interior configuration has been designed to comfortably accommodate up to 8 guests overnight in 4 cabins, comprising a master suite, 2 VIP stateroom, 1 double cabins. She is also capable of carrying up to 6 crew onboard in 3 cabins to ensure a relaxed luxury yacht experience. 

CONSTRUCTION & DIMENSIONS 

Kabir features a planing grp hull and grp superstructure, with teak decks. She was built to BV (Bureau Veritas) classification society rules, and is MCA LY2 Compliant.

This luxury yacht is also fitted with 'zero speed stabilizers' which work at anchor, increasing on-board comfort when the yacht is stationary, particularly in rough waters. 

PERFORMANCE 

Powered by 2 MTU (16V 4000 M90) 3,750hp diesel engines and propelled by her twin waterjets Motor yacht Kabir is capable of a top speed of 32 knots, and comfortably cruises at 28 knots. With her 5,000 gallons fuel tanks she has a maximum range of 550 nautical miles at 28 knots. Her water tanks store around 1,000 Gallons of fresh water.

WALKTHROUGH 

The Master Stateroom is a full beam master with king size island berth. Included is his and her closets, vanity, and full size hutch. The flat screen is centered across from the island berth. Entry to the master stateroom is through a separate TV and Office lounge area. The ensuite head includes his and her sinks and his and her toilets, each one enclosed with it’s own frosted glass door. In between the toilet stalls is an enclosed stand up shower with steam bath.

The Forward VIP includes a full size bed, Pullman bunk, ensuite bathroom with stall shower and separate working office.

Port and Starboard guest cabins (between Master and VIP) are mirror image staterooms. Each one includes an island queen berth, mirrored closet and ensuite bathroom with stall shower.

Upon entering the Aft deck area you have seating for six, entry to the Aft Salon, and stairs to the flybridge.  On the lower deck you will find a large seating area,  

Upon entering the Salon you have lounging and seating to your right and a full bar to your left.  Forward, on both sides is access to the helm along with access to the forward salon and formal dining.  Entry along the port side also allows for entry below to the main galley and crew area.

Upon entry to the Mid-deck Salon you are greeted by the Formal Dining Area, serving six.  The TV island provides visual separation between the dining area and the salon.  Salon area includes port and starboard seating.

Forward, portside, is the stairway to the day head followed by the guest cabins.

You are first greeted by the Forward VIP which includes a full size bed, Pullman bunk, ensuite bathroom with stall shower and separate working office.

Aft of that is the main passageway leading to the port and starboard guest cabins and the master stateroom.

The Master Stateroom is a full beam master with king size island berth.  Included is his and her closets, vanity, and full size hutch.  The flat screen is centered across from the island berth.  Entry to the master stateroom is through a separate TV and Office lounge area.  The ensuite head includes his and her sinks and his and her toilets, each one enclosed with it’s own frosted glass door.  In between the toilet stalls is an enclosed stand up shower with steam bath.

Port and Starboard guest cabins (between Master and VIP) are mirror image staterooms.  Each one includes an island queen berth, mirrored closet and ensuite bathroom with stall shower.

Moving all the way again to the aft deck gives us access to the Flybridge area which accommodates a day head.  Starboard side is seating and sunning areas.  

On the bow is the sunpad and  sunshade.

AFT DECK, SPLIT LEVEL

  • Gorgeous teak decking throughout
  • Aft dining for six, upper level
  • Covered wing storage, port and starboard, for one jet ski each
  • Steps, port and starboard, leading down to Jacuzzi and swim platform
  • Portside teak stairs leading to flybridge
  • Oversize sunshade

 FLYBRIDGE

  • Sliding electric glass door secures flybridge
  • Aft dining for 6
  • Casual seating for 10, starboard
  • Sunpad forward

 AFT UPPER SALON AND HELM AREA

  • Full wet bar, portside
  • Enclosed Flatscreen TV, forward, center, rises up for viewing.  (Helm area ahead)
  • Casual seating, starboard side
  • Twin coffee tables
  • Port and Starboard Access to helm area

HELM AREA

  • Seating for three
  • Humphrey Stabilizer system
  • Chart stations port and starboard
  • Furuno 1834C Radar Pilot House
  • Furuno Black Box FAR 2117 Radar Pilot House
  • Furuno FA 150 AIS System
  • Furuno Fax 30-NavNet Whip Antenna with FAX-5 Navtex
  • Furuno FM 8800 HS-2003 RB 8800 RB 8800 VHF ASN Class A fMO & SMSDSM
  • Furuno GD-1920C Radar Pilot House
  • Furuno GP37PRO DGPS SBAS/WAAS GP-320B GPS
  • Furuno NavNet ETR-6 Depth
  • Furuno FS 1570 MF/HF Radiotelephone
  • Furuno RD 30 Data Repeater
  • Airmar Ultrasonic weather Station Wind Transducer

  LOWER SALON, FORWARD

  • Port and Starboard access from Upper Salon
  • Main elegant dining for 6
  • Center unit houses rising flatscreen TV
  • Social seating port and starboard
  • Kaliedascape system with Apple Mini computer and remote controls
  • Stairway forward leads to staterooms below
  • Day head at bottom of stairs

 MASTER STATEROOM

  • King size island berth, storage underneath
  • Full length hutch, starboard
  • Vanity, port side
  • His and Hers walk in closets
  • Nightstands with lamps
  • Flatscreen TV w multi function remote
  • Vanity, portside

Master Stateroom Head

  • Steam sauna / stand up shower
  • His and Hers toilet stalls, with door
  • His and Hers sinks.

Separate Working Office

  • Built-in desk and shelving
  • Flatscreen
  • Sound system
  • Two padded crocodile upholstered chairs
  • Table

 VIP, FORWARD

  • Full size bed
  • Pullman bunk
  • Flatscreen TV
  • Ensuite head with stall shower
  • Attached working office with yacht instrument repeaters

GUEST CABINS

  • Located between the Master and VIP cabins
  • One cabin portside, the other starboard.
  • Island queen berth
  • Mirrored closet
  • Flatscreen TV
  • Ensuite head with stall shower

CREW CABINS, lower deck, three cabins

  • Over and under twin size bunks
  • Flat screen TV
  • Ensuite head with stall shower

GALLEY

  • Crew dining area with flatscreen TV
  • Four refrigerators, professional style
  • Gaggenau oven with four burner electric top
  • Stainless steel full size countertop
  • Twin basin stainless steel sink
  • Zanussi dishwasher x 2
  • Microwave/convection oven
  • Underfloor Pantry
  • Underfloor freezer x 2

LAUNDRY ROOM / STORAGE

  • Full size Miele Dryer x 2
  • Full size Miele Washer x 2
  • Freezers x 2

ENGINE ROOM

  • MTU 16V4000 M90 x 2, under 1,000 original hours, 3,650 horsepower Each.
  • 2 x Kohler 70 EF0Z generators, 70kw each
  • 2 x KAMEWA 71 S II waterjets 

 

"Kabir" not for sale to U.S. residents in U.S. waters

dealerListings.description:
INCREDIBLE VALUE FOR AN OUTSTANDING VESSEL!

New black bimini top installed!  2/20  Fresh  black bottom paint, the black boot stripe polished, the hull acid washed,  4/20  New a/c pump 6/20, New Windshield Washer motors 6/20.  Compounded and Waxed 8/20

1000 Hour service just completed 8/20 along with full Generator service.

2001 Tiara 4000 Express,  lightly used, professionally maintained, in exceptional condition and turnkey !

This vessel is owned by a licensed captain/caring owner that has been boating for more than 50+ years. The elderly owner is no longer able to use boat as frequently as he’d like to, he will consider accepting a reasonable offer on this meticulously maintained vessel.

Pride of ownership is apparent everywhere when you step aboard this beautiful Cummins Turbo-Charged Engines (Factory Upgraded Power Option) Tiara Express, You simply won't find a cleaner 4000 Express on the market today. "Silver Lining" is kept professionally maintained in Boca Raton, FL and is easy to show.  

Also included but not limited to, monthly diving and zinc replacements (when needed), and regular bi-weekly professional washings. Key notes, items replaced between 2016 and 2017: Forward A/C unit (7000btu) and the Main Salon unit (16,000btu), A/C Sea Water Pump, Refrigerator, Cockpit Icemaker, Flat Screen TV in Salon, House and Engine Battery Banks, VHF Radio, Raytheon Depth Sounder, Raytheon GPS, Raytheon Plotter Chart Chip, and the remote spotlight.  

As part of regular professional monthly systems checkup, all hoses and clamps, pumps, fuel and hydraulic lines, fuel and engine filters, fittings, impellers, fuses, etc., are replaced whenever needed.  This regular monthly professional maintenance program also includes the boat being professionally washed every other week and a diver bottom cleaning and replacing zincs monthly.

This boat is a must see!

Forward A/C unit (7000btu) and the Main Salon unit (16,000btu), A/C Sea Water Pump, Refrigerator, Cockpit Icemaker, Flat Screen TV in Salon, House and Engine Battery Banks, VHF Radio, Raytheon Depth Sounder, Raytheon GPS, Raytheon Plotter Chart Chip, and the remote spotlight.  Fire system just recertified.

Generator and engines serviced regularly, port and starboard Racors changed along with Impellors.  Bottom cleaned monthly and zinc replaced regularly.

As part of regular professional monthly systems checkup, all hoses and clamps, pumps, fuel and hydraulic lines, fuel and engine filters, fittings, impellers, fuses, etc., are replaced whenever needed. This regular monthly professional maintenance program also includes the boat being professionally washed every other week and a diver bottom cleaning and replacing zincs monthly.

media.description:
INCREDIBLE VALUE FOR AN OUTSTANDING VESSEL!
<br>
New black bimini top installed!  2/20  Fresh  black bottom paint, the black boot stripe polished, the hull acid washed,  4/20  New a/c pump 6/20, New Windshield Washer motors 6/20.  Compounded and Waxed 8/20

1000 Hour service just completed 8/20 along with full Generator service.

2001 Tiara 4000 Express,  lightly used, professionally maintained, in exceptional condition and turnkey !

This vessel is owned by a licensed captain/caring owner that has been boating for more than 50+ years. The elderly owner is no longer able to use boat as frequently as he&rsquo;d like to, he will consider accepting a reasonable offer on this meticulously maintained vessel.

Pride of ownership is apparent everywhere when you step aboard this beautiful Cummins Turbo-Charged Engines (Factory Upgraded Power Option) Tiara Express, You simply won't find a cleaner 4000 Express on the market today. &quot;Silver Lining&quot; is kept professionally maintained in Boca Raton, FL and is easy to show.  

Also included but not limited to, monthly diving and zinc replacements (when needed), and regular bi-weekly professional washings. Key notes, items replaced between 2016 and 2017: Forward A/C unit (7000btu) and the Main Salon unit (16,000btu), A/C Sea Water Pump, Refrigerator, Cockpit Icemaker, Flat Screen TV in Salon, House and Engine Battery Banks, VHF Radio, Raytheon Depth Sounder, Raytheon GPS, Raytheon Plotter Chart Chip, and the remote spotlight.  

As part of regular professional monthly systems checkup, all hoses and clamps, pumps, fuel and hydraulic lines, fuel and engine filters, fittings, impellers, fuses, etc., are replaced whenever needed. This boat is a must see!

dealerListings.description:
Preliminary Listing

"Island Son" is a very good example of a well cared for 53 foot Hatteras, the boat shows very well thanks to her meticulous owner who cares for the boat. She is equipped with twin Detroit 12V71TI's and two generators.  All systems on the listing are in working order. She is currently in the water and being enjoyed by the sellers here in South Florida and ready for her new owners to enjoy.

descriptions.title: Description
descriptions.description:
This beautiful Hatteras model was the industry standard for sport fishing yachts over 50'. Her long foredeck and sweeping sheer combine to present the aggressive appearance of a thoroughbred sportfisherman, and her low-freeboard cockpit has never been surpassed for sheer fishability.

"Island Boy" features significant updates, including but not limited to, custom aluminum top and ladder up to the bridge, custom bait freezer in cockpit, etc.

The spacious salon is open and comfortable with a leather sofa and single rotating leather chairs both port and starboard. The vessel is equipped with the preferred galley down galley layout. 

The accommodations on the lower deck provide for a master stateroom amidships port with a queen berth. A guest stateroom forward with upper and lower berths positioned on both starboard and port bulkhead (4 berths).  All staterooms have ensuite heads.


Galley

descriptions.title: Manufacturer Provided Description
descriptions.description:
The latest breakthrough in our revolutionary stepped hull designs maintains fuel efficiency while delivering superior safety, stability and handling – even at the higher speeds provided by a reliable twin power package.

A roomier cockpit and luxurious forward deck serve as platforms for whatever activity you choose, be it fishing, diving, cruising or entertaining. Incredible storage capacity accommodates extra large rod lockers, fish boxes, bait wells, coolers, dive gear and more. Also designed to serve as the ideal on-board yacht tender, it’s convenient to trailer or tow.

Expansive freeboard tops stylish new sheer and tumblehome transom lines. Signature Intrepid comforts include a spacious head and changing room hidden in the console, plush wraparound forward seating with electric backrests, and integrated or removable rear bench seating.

dealerListings.description:
Hovertrek Hovercraft Rescue Deluxe 6 Passenger Inline Seating Model 5852

Single Gas HIRTH 100HP Carbureted Engine with Reverse Thrusters!

Trailer Included and all Standard Electronics Package. (See Video)

Price: $73,400 

Our Hovertrek Hovercraft Rescue Deluxe 6 Passenger Inline Seating Model 5852 is fully assembled with all standard options. The price on this Rescue 5852 features the largest HP engine package (100HP) available for this model; a Custom Hovercraft Trailer; Standard Electronics Package and Reverse Thrusters! (see video).

Neoteric Rescue Hovercraft - The Industry Standard

First responders worldwide recognize that a hovercraft is the only rescue vehicle able to perform fast, safe rescue operations on swift water, thin or broken ice, flood waters, mud and snow. Because it safely hovers 9 inches above the terrain, a hovercraft keeps your rescue team above the danger – not in it – and gives you access to areas a boat or helicopter cannot reach.

But the Neoteric Hovertrek™ is not just another rescue hovercraft. Its unique capabilities have made it the industry standard worldwide. Our clientele spans 50+ nations and includes the U.S. Border Patrol, Department of Homeland Security; Police, Sheriff and Fire Departments; Airport Police/Fire/EMS Services; National Parks Services, and more.

There is no vehicle comparable to a hovercraft – especially the Neoteric Hovertrek. With the Hovertrek, you won't own just a versatile sport and utility vehicle; you'll own more than 40 years of solid research and development, unsurpassed engineering, award-winning design, and the only hovercraft in the world with effective brakes. Features: Patented Reverse Thrust; Customizable; Lightweight; Trailerable; Lowest Profile.

JUST IMAGINE accessing places that no other vehicle can reach. Whether you’re trying to traverse now, rapids, shallow or marshes, a hovercraft can get you there. Need to cross tidal areas or ice to your island? Think hovercraft. Need to save the life of someone who has fallen through the ice or trapped by flood waters without becoming a victim yourself? A Neoteric hovercraft is your safest bet, and you don’t even need a dock. Designed by the most experienced engineers in the business Neoteric Hovercraft outperform the competition in reliability, maneuverability and quality of construction. So, what are you waiting for? Whether it’s for work or play, inquire today so we can help you plan how to dominate your terrain.

Our Hovercraft have several different engine packages with lots of additional options. Depending on how you intend to use your Hovercraft will help us determine the right model, engine package and custom options that will best suit your needs. 

Inquire to receive the full Hovercraft Specifications for this Rescue Model 5852.

description:
3D Virtual Tour Available. 

KIMBERLY is a USA-built, tri-deck motoryacht with Palmer Johnson pedigree and an ownership history of very experienced yachtsmen. Her interior volume is impressive for the length at 321 gross tons, highlighted by an absolutely massive main salon, excellent skylounge, complimented by generous outdoor spaces. A wonderful boat for traveling or entertaining guests, the cherry wood interior is elegant, yet warm and inviting. KIMBERLY has benefited from several refits during her history and has undergone extensive maintenance and upgrades under the current ownership.

KIMBERLY is a rare find in this category in terms of volume, pedigree and overall quality. She must be seen to fully appreciate.

contact.name: Northrop and Johnson Newport Beach, CA

descriptions.title: Highlights
descriptions.description:
• Pedigree Palmer Johnson, built in the USA

  • Large volume interior at 321GT

  • 4 stateroom layout with massive, full beam salon

  • Dedicated, private sun deck with Jacuzzi

  • Exceptionally large swimstep

  • Warm and elegant cherry wood interior throughout

  • Extensively maintained and upgraded over the years

descriptions.title: Accommodations / Walkthrough
descriptions.description:
3D Virtual Tour Available. 

KIMBERLY features a four stateroom layout with full beam master, private VIP stateroom located forward and two generous guest staterooms. The interior features elegant, warm cherry wood interior complimented by elegant and comfortable interior appointments.

descriptions.title: Salon
descriptions.description: The full beam main salon is absolutely massive for a yacht of this length and is a perfect platform for entertaining guests or just lounging with friends. Entering from the aft deck there is a large bar on the starboard side. There are two large sofas on the port side with coffee tables and a formal dining area occupying the forward area of the salon.

descriptions.title: Main Deck Office
descriptions.description: There is an office on the main deck, adjacent to the foyer, which can be converted into to temporary stateroom for an additional guest, nanny or pilot.

descriptions.title: Galley
descriptions.description:
The galley is located on the main deck, forward of the main foyer. The space occupies the full beam, with lots of windows in a country kitchen style. Features include abundant counterspace, updated appliances and a large, built-in dinette. 

  • Range: GE Profile Performance induction cooktop (electric)

  • Oven: KitchenAid Convection (electric)

  • Grill: Lazy-Man BBQ (LPG)

  • Microwave: Frigidaire Gallery

  • Refrigeration/Freezer: SubZero 249RP; SubZero 632

  • Icemaker: U-Line (flybridge bar)

  • Wine Cooler

  • Small Fridge: U-Line (flybridge bar), Kenmore 1.5

  • Dishwasher: Bosch

  • Trash Compactor: KitchenAid

  • Miscellaneous: Bloomfield coffee maker, Adcraft Panini Press, Nutrifaster N450 Juicer, Simonelli Micro Bar

descriptions.title: Accommodations Deck
descriptions.description: The accommodations deck is accessed via a stairwell from the main foyer and features three of the four guest staterooms. The full beam master cabin is furthest aft.

descriptions.title: Master Stateroom
descriptions.description: The master stateroom features a centerline king-sized bed, His-and-Hers heads and matching walk-in closets.

descriptions.title: VIP Stateroom
descriptions.description: The VIP stateroom is located on the accommodations deck, access via a stairwell forward of the galley. It features a centerline queen berth, ensuite head and shower and ample storage space.

descriptions.title: Crew Quarters
descriptions.description: The crew accommodations are immediately aft of the VIP stateroom. Featuring two staterooms and can sleep four. There is an additional crew cabin aft of the engine room.

3D Virtual Tour and 360° Interactive Photo Available.

ELISA is truly a joy to be aboard and pride of ownership shows. Offered for sale by the second owner, she is a proven traveler and has never been chartered. The six stateroom layout with elevator offers maximum space and versatility, complimented by an elegant and beautifully crafted interior. Her ABS five-year survey was completed in 2017. ELISA must be seen to be fully appreciated and is an exceptional value in this market.

contact.name: Northrop and Johnson Newport Beach, CA

descriptions.title: Accommodations/Walkthrough
descriptions.description:
3D Virtual Tour and 360° Interactive Photo Available.

 

Six staterooms sleeping a total of twelve guests. The master stateroom is on the main deck with full walk-in closet and his and hers bathrooms. The other five staterooms are on the accommodations deck. The two aftermost staterooms have king sized beds, the mid-port and forward-port staterooms have queen sized beds, and the starboard-forward stateroom has side-by-side twins. All of the guest staterooms have ensuite heads with full size stall showers. The interior is traditional and features finely crafted American Cherry joinery throughout, complimented by elegant stonework and high-quality fixtures. A 3-person elevator services all decks.

dealerListings.description:
BAJAVENTO is a custom racer/cruiser sloop. She was originally designed and built for ocean racing by naval architect, Fatih Gorbon.

BAJAVENTO was launched in 1997 and refitted in 2001 as an ocean cruiser.

Licensed to charter in Mexico but has never been chartered. Qualified, prospective buyers that charter BAJAVENTO can get their charter fees put toward the purchase price of the boat if upon a successful closing.

contact.name: Northrop and Johnson Newport Beach, CA

descriptions.title: Accommodations / Walkthrough
descriptions.description:
Accommodations / Walkthrough Large master stateroom aft with centerline double bed, head and shower, drawers and hanging closet. Separate single bunk bed and settees.

Comfortable guest stateroom with center double bed forward with head and shower, drawers, hanging closet and settee.

Captain's cabin to port with head and shower. Crew cabin forward with small head and shower.

Walkthrough galley starboard with electric ceramic stove, two refrigerators, freezer, microwave, ice maker.

Large salon with center wood table surrounded by beige leather settees, a flat screen TV/CD/DVD player, refrigerator and liquor bar.

Navigation desk area with VHF, instruments and electrical panels. Full air conditioning systems in all compartments below deck.

Check out STEADFAST's 3D Tour!

Seldom do truly great yacht opportunities come on the market. The very best purpose-built platforms tend to stay with owners for extended periods because they are appreciated and enjoyed for what they were built to do. This type of vessel, when matched with an exceptional owner, makes for an unparalleled team, which creates the unique experiences one can have on the sea. But eventually, the time comes to let the vessel pass on to its next caretaker. After years of adventure, STEADFAST is now ready for a new family to cherish and make new memories.

contact.name: Northrop and Johnson Newport Beach, CA

descriptions.title: Accommodations / Walkthrough
descriptions.description:
Check out STEADFAST's 3D Tour!

STEADFAST is the result of blending mega-yacht amenities with professional sportfishing capabilities. Without overlooking a single detail or requiring compromise, this is an exceptional accomplishment. Maintained to the highest degree plus with an impressive fishing record, STEADFAST will not disappoint.

For the luxury aficionados, there are four exquisitely appointed staterooms. Rare on a vessel of its size, the master stateroom is located forward on the main deck with large windows, centerline king bed, a private head with bathtub. The three additional staterooms are down and accessed separately from the crew accommodations for more privacy. Each stateroom features a queen bed, entertainment center and an ensuite head.

For the sportfishing enthusiast, careful planning has accounted for every scenario. Up top, there is a fishing bucket with complete engine controls, sightlines to bow and stern and a bench seat for four. On the bow, a structural pulpit reaches out ten feet with a recessed baitwell to starboard. The main deck walkarounds, with no obstructions, lead aft to the expansive cockpit, huge island bait/tackle station, fighting chair and outriggers.

Notwithstanding, STEADFAST is also the perfect family yacht. The main deck is laid out as an open concept with entrees aft and from port or starboard. The comfortable main salon is aft and adjacent to the formal dining space with built-in seating for eight. Across to starboard is the wet bar, bar stools for three and entertainment center. The entire area is open and leads forward to the chef's galley on port and starboard companionway to enter the master suite. Just outside of the salon on the California deck, another dinette for eight guests transforms into an intimate dining space.

dealerListings.description: RUNAWAY is an Alan Andrews designed, Dencho Marine built, Custom 70 Turbo racing cruising sloop. The tall Omohundro Carbon Fiber rig with five spreaders was new in 2000. The carbon fiber hull was up upgraded and modernized with extensive alterations to the bow and stern sections in 2000-2001. The deck was completely stripped of all winches and hardware and professionally Awlgripped with a new non-skid surface in 2017. In 2019 a bow roller and anchor winch were installed along with a roller furling headsail and a couple of electric winches.

contact.name: Northrop and Johnson Newport Beach, CA

descriptions.title: Accommodations / Walkthrough
descriptions.description:
The aft deck features twin helm stations. Moving forward is a large sailing cockpit with seating area. The entrance to below is midship. Moving aft of the steps and to starboard is the complete galley. Opposite of the galley and to port are 12 crew storage lockers. Just aft of the lockers is a desk and seat. Further aft, is the midship full navigation station with desk and seating. There are 4 pipe berths to port and 4 pipe berths to starboard.

The midship salon features a new couch and dining table to starboard. To port are additional pipe berths. Forward is the enclosed head and shower. Continuing forward is a new centerline double berth.

Accommodations

General

Azimut 116 has guest accommodations for up to 10 in 5 staterooms, along with crew accommodations for up to 6 in three cabins.

 

Owner

The master cabin is located on the main deck forward.  It features a king bed, complete bath with shower and separate Jacuzzi tub. Electric frosted privacy glass.

 

Guests

The VIP cabin is located forward on the main deck.  It features a complete bath with shower.            

The two double cabins are located on the lower deck and they both have private baths with showers.           

In addition, the twin cabin is also located on the lower deck with two twin beds & Pullman with bath and shower. 

 

Crew

The crew accommodations are located in the lower level bow.  The captain quarters feature a double bed with private bathroom and shower.  The two twin cabins each have two single twin beds and their own bathrooms with showers.

dealerListings.description:
Captain maintained 2016 Numarine 62 Fly for sale. "SEBASTIAN" has three staterooms and three heads plus crew. Her fly bridge is generous and expansive complete with wet bar, grill, table, and sunpad. There is a full bimini top over the fly bridge that can be put down for bridge clearance or sun exposure. 

Manufacturer provided description:

Following the glamorous success of the 70' and 78' models, the shipyard has unveiled its latest masterpiece: the Numarine 62, available in both Flybridge and Hardtop versions. Two new additions to Omer Malaz's pearl necklace.   Measuring 19.16 metres overall, the Numarine 62 successfully reproduces the same concept and sporty design common to all the yard's family line products.   But do not call it a compact yacht: ample open areas and brightly lit interiors define the shipyard's traditional and unique distribution of space, while the use of the IPS transmission system enabled the fitting of oversized fuel tanks, thus making the craft a cruiser with no boundaries.

descriptions.title: Manufacturer Provided Description
descriptions.description: Introducing the Sea Ray SLX 350 Outboard, delivering all the benefits of the popular SLX 350 with the addition of premium Mercury Verado outboard power. This is a no-trade-offs vessel: Enjoy more space for friends and family, more power for the activities you love, more ease, more style and more fun all around. An array of Sea Ray's Next Wave innovations-from the noise-quashing powers of Quiet Ride to the precision and stability of Dynamic Running Surface to the agility of joystick piloting technology-take the experience to the next level. And a host of intelligent features combine in a sleek, stylish package that exceeds all expectations. In short, the SLX 350 Outboard will make you want to spend even more time on the water.

description:
“PRICE JUST REDUCED TO $4.5 MILLION NOW WITH $4.0 MILLION CASH DOWN AT CLOSING AND $500K SELLER’S MORTGAGE SECURED BY FIRST LIEN ON VIVERE OR PRICE FURTHER REDUCED TO $4.3 MILLION CASH AT CLOSING”

JUST FINISHING UP STRONG SUMMER CHARTER SEASON AND HEAD SOUTH TO FLORIDA AFTER 11/1.

 

2008 AZIMUT 116 MY W/ MTU 16V2000 ENGINES.

"Vivere" was custom built for the Originals owners and Captain been onboard since new. Great Charter boat and she's cruised the US, Bahamas and Caribbean waters. She had a very strong Summer charter season again even with the current conditions. 

Dark blue hull sides and Sleek styling by Stefano Righini makes her stand out underway and its great exterior layout makes her the perfect boat for long range cruising with family and guests. Sleeps 10 comfortably in the cabins and crew for 5 makes her perfect for private use or Charter guests. 

Walk into the large main deck with generous open space with large, comfortable seating with sofas/chairs and fully appointed bar area to port which leads to the large dining area forward. Enclosed galley to port with plenty of storage and counter space for cooking. Easy access to the crew area from the galley. The interior blend of light carpeting and Dark furnishings gives her a comfortable feeling on board. On Deck Master stateroom with King forward on the main deck with en-suite Jacuzzi tub, private shower and lots of storage makes this owners cabin special. Below deck are 4 comfortable cabins with 2 doubles and 2 sets of twin berths with en-suite head and shower for the guests.

Pilothouse offers full electronics in the wrap around dash with single helm and aft port side seating and table for crew and guests. Captain has computer and printer at work station and storage for charts and documents. Walk up to the Flybridge Helm area with sliding Roof. Bar area with seating to enjoy the open air feel. Large U shape seating area with table to starboard for relaxing and as you walk aft enjoy the Hot Tub area with sun pad loungers to enjoy the sun.

Down to the aft Cockpit area with large, comfortable seating and Custom wood table for dining under the extended roof while enjoying al fresco dining. Cockpit also features a Foldaway Anti-glare TV to enjoy. Walk forward to the bow area by spacious decks leading to nice bow seating area to enjoy. Dual Anchors for extended anchoring while onboard. Charter quests have enjoyed the outdoor living aboard Vivere.

Easy access to the engine room and Aft Garage area converted into a great workspace and storage area. MTU engines and Dual Gen sets, watermaker and Machinery accessed through bulkhead door from garage. Includes 24' Sea Strike Center Console with twin 150HP engines.

"Vivere" means "to Live' and the many guests onboard over the years have enjoyed life to its fullest. She offers great layout with sleeping for 10 guests and a lot of outdoor space to enjoy time onboard cruising with family and friends. Come see what she offers and get out on the water soon.

Located in New Jersey area. Please call for more details..

Seller will consider "Owner Financing"

descriptions.title: Manufacturer Provided Description
descriptions.description: Experience the open air in the GT45X Openand enjoy legendary Hatteras quality in a powerful, versatile boat that is both a well-equipped fishing vessel and a comfortable setting to relax and entertain. The GT45X Open delivers on the Hatteras tradition of unmatched build and ride quality while achieving speeds of more than 40 knots, ensuring an ideal experience for anglers and cruisers alike.

dealerListings.description:
Piece A Cake is equipped for relaxing and entertaining on a grand scale. Her huge and
commanding flybridge gives the first clue to this remarkable yacht’s sociable intentions. Large,
spacious entertaining areas are in evidence throughout the extensive saloon and upper deck
areas, through to the private staterooms, where light and space are combined to stunning effect.
All are created using only the very finest materials, including exotic woods, hand-selected granite
work surfaces and state-of-the-art design features. Four grand private staterooms combine light
and space to stunning effect and as you move through the large, spacious entertaining areas you
start to appreciate the wealth of well-considered features.
